text: Mile End is an area in London, England. It is in the London Borough of Tower Hamlets. It is east-northeast of Charing Cross. Mile End had a population of 28,544 in 2011. ==Transport== Mile End has a London Underground station of the same name. Three railway lines, the District, Hammersmith & City and Central lines serve this station. ==References== Category:Areas of London
title: Mile End
